description: One of the Windows Eventlogs has been cleared. e.g. caused by "wevtutil cl" command execution
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Rollout of log collection agents (the setup routine often includes a reset of the local Eventlog)
System provisioning (system reset before the golden image creation)
name: Eventlog Cleared
query: (winlog.channel:"System" AND (winlog.event_id:"104" AND Provider_Name:"Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog") AND (NOT winlog.channel:("Application" OR "Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational" OR "Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" OR "PowerShellCore/Operational" OR "Security" OR "System" OR "Windows PowerShell")))
